attributes.additional_details: Cannabis should be legalised and utilised. This useful plant should be completely legalised for both recreational and industrial use. How can our government ignore a plant which could give us a fuel source (Henry Fords first car ran on ethanol derived from the cannabis plant). Imagine how our world would change if every farmer in the country was growing fuel in his/her field on a yearly basis. It has the potential to abolish our constant search for oil which has led our country into wars and caused pollution on a massive scale. This is before you take into account the medicinal properties of Cannabis. Our government has constantly ignored the scientists advice as well as the estimated 5 million UK user...
